ygData.subject: One small thing...
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a small suggestion.  Roughly half of the past two digests have been quoted material.  It makes this VERY hard to read, since usually the poster writes a
ygData.messageBody:
I have a small suggestion. Roughly half of the past two digests have been quoted material. It makes this VERY hard to read, since usually the poster writes a line or two, then quotes many. Please, cut what is unnecessary from your posts. For the sake of all of our eyes. Like the long hours playing EQ weren't enough... ;)

PS: Is it even possible to have a guild over more than one server?

May your rhythms be true!

Pistov, of Cazic-Thule.
